title: misleading syntax error message
body:
by **amcnabb8**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Create syntaxerror.go with the following contents:
package syntaxerror
type xyz struct {
	ch chan
}
2. 8g syntaxerror.go

What is the expected output?
An error message like "channel of what?" or "the type of ch is
incompletely specified."

What do you see instead?
syntaxerror.go:4: syntax error: unexpected }

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?
Linux i386

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
5992bf56aa72 tip
